mapper.insert: insert into TBL_BOTTOM_DISABLED (ID, DISTRICT_NAME, TOWN_NAME, VILLAGE_NAME, NAME, ID_NUMBER, DISABILITY_CATEGORY, DISABLED_LEVEL, CERTIFICATION_TIME, CHILD_REHABILITATION_ASS, SPIRIT_REHABILITATION_ASS, AUXILIARY_NUMBER, DISABLED_BREED_NUMBER, SELF_PROPELLED, DISABLED_SELF_PROPELLED, LONG_DISTANCE_EDUCATION, BARRIER_FREE_RECONSTRUCTION, REMARKS, ZONE_YEAR ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabilityCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disabledLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{childRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{spiritRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auxiliaryNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disabledBreedNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{selfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disabledSelfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{longDistanceEducation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{barrierFreeReconstruction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )

mapper.update:
update TBL_BOTTOM_DISABLED
DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISABILITY_CATEGORY = #{disabilityCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISABLED_LEVEL = #{disabledLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERTIFICATION_TIME = #{certificationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHILD_REHABILITATION_ASS = #{childRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPIRIT_REHABILITATION_ASS = #{spiritRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUXILIARY_NUMBER = #{auxiliaryNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISABLED_BREED_NUMBER = #{disabledBreedNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SELF_PROPELLED = #{selfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISABLED_SELF_PROPELLED = #{disabledSelfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LONG_DISTANCE_EDUCATION = #{longDistanceEducation,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BARRIER_FREE_RECONSTRUCTION = #{barrierFreeReconstruction,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TBL_BOTTOM_DISABLED set DISTRICT_NAME = #{districtName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN_NAME = #{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VILLAGE_NAME = #{villageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NUMBER = #{idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABILITY_CATEGORY = #{disabilityCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DISABLED_LEVEL = #{disabledLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATION_TIME = #{certificationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHILD_REHABILITATION_ASS = #{childRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SPIRIT_REHABILITATION_ASS = #{spiritRehabilitationAss,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUXILIARY_NUMBER = #{auxiliaryNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISABLED_BREED_NUMBER = #{disabledBreedNumber,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SELF_PROPELLED = #{selfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISABLED_SELF_PROPELLED = #{disabledSelfPropelled,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LONG_DISTANCE_EDUCATION = #{longDistanceEducation,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BARRIER_FREE_RECONSTRUCTION = #{barrierFreeReconstruction,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZONE_YEAR = #{zoneYear,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
